claim_summary: A 2021 Arkansas Legislative Audit of the Department of Corrections reported that the agency failed to maintain vendor invoices supporting purchases as required by Ark. Code ยง 19-4-815, exposing the agency to questions about the legitimacy of those purchases and leading auditors to recommend establishing procedures to maintain proper documentation and comply with cash receipt rules.

source.title: Department of Corrections Annual Financial Report (June 30, 2021)
